long_description: This Ice Tubes 24-Tube tray makes tubes of ice that slip easily into narrow-mouth sport bottles to keep your drinks cold and refreshing on hot summer days. A single tray produces 24 tubes of ice measuring approximately 3.5 in. long. Simply fill tray with water and freeze.
short_description: This Ice Tubes 24-Tube tray makes tubes of ice that slip easily into narrow-mouth sport bottles to keep your drinks cold and refreshing on hot summer days.
